definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
local currency/our own currency/abbr. to 本幣|本币

pinyin: jin1 hui4 dui4 ben3 wei4 zhi4

sentences.english: There are two naturals in this chord.
sentences.chinese: 这一和弦中有两个本位音。

sentences.english: Which shaketh the earth out of her place, and the pillars thereof tremble.
sentences.chinese: 他使地震动，离其本位，地的柱子就摇撼。

sentences.english: Hast thou commanded the morning since thy days; and caused the dayspring to know his place;
sentences.chinese: 你自生以来，曾命定晨光，使清晨的日光知道本位。

sentences.english: The whole machinery of gold exchange standard is in the formative stage.
sentences.chinese: 金汇兑本位制的整个机制正在成型阶段。

sentences.english: General Ledger business unit supports one base currency per ledger.
sentences.chinese: “总帐”业务单支持帐与本位币一对一的关系。

sentences.english: Choosing standard money of charge to an account is business accounting of accounting of industry of condition foreign enterprise cannot evasive problem.
sentences.chinese: 选择记账本位币是境外企业会计核算不能回避的问题。
中国于1935年放弃银本位制。

sentences.english: The UK hasn't had a gold standard for the past three generations.
sentences.chinese: 英国在过去的三代里一直没有金本位制。

sentences.english: Of, based on, or using the principles of bimetallism .
sentences.chinese: 以复本位制为基础，或与之相关。

sentences.english: So   England became on the gold standard.
sentences.chinese: 于是，英国成为了一个金本位制度的国家。

sentences.english: According to the regulations, the financial reports of all the domestic enterprises have to be kept with Renminbi as the standard accounting unit.
sentences.chinese: 内的企业所有的财务报表都要以人民币为记帐本位币。

sentences.english: After World War II, nations adopted the dollar-exchange standard.
sentences.chinese: 二战后，各国采用了美元汇兑本位。

sentences.english: "officer standard" is going on now for a variety of complex reasons.
sentences.chinese: 由于种种复杂的原因，“官本位”现象延伸至今。

sentences.english: In X the set functional currency is RMB.
sentences.chinese: 在X所设定的本位币为人民币。

sentences.english: The base currency set in X is RMB.
sentences.chinese: 在X所设定的本位币为人民币。

sentences.english: There are home and source currencies in order to be able to deal with transactions with foreign countries.
sentences.chinese: 在国际贸易中会涉及本位币与源货币。

definition: local currency/our own currency/abbr. to 本幣|本币

definition: the civil service system/the bureaucratic system
old system/weights and measures of former times
pluralism, philosophical doctrine that the universe consists of different substances
dividing line between distinct realms/boundary/field-allocation (in Chinese astrology, the association between celestial regions and corresponding terrestrial realms)
